p.k: 79% A department store Santa sets out to prove to a sceptical modern world that he is the real thing. Heartwarming tale with an Oscar-winning performance from Edmund Gwenn

72% Drama following the incredible story of Henri Charriere, and his fight to escape the brutal penal colony on Devil's Island when he is framed for murder. With Rami Malek
80% Mercenary Leonardo DiCaprio helps Djimon Hounsou find his stolen son in exchange for a rare jewel, in war-torn Sierra Leone. Thriller
Hollywood icon Steve McQueen searches for the iconic Mustang from his film BULLITT, reflecting on his life's highs and lows along the way. Biopic drama with Andre Brooks
